main_definition: Mice refers to small rodents belonging to the genus Mus, typically found in human dwellings as pests.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiom meaning an unexpected or unusual situation arising suddenly
meanings_and_examples.example: When he got promoted out of nowhere, it felt like mice were scurrying in the office.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A slang term referring to small problems that add up and cause significant issues over time
meanings_and_examples.example: Ignoring minor maintenance on our car could lead to a whole lot of mice down the road.
